title: Cutting rules definition
description: Definition of the cutting probabilities depending on the text-environment for a given language.

lang.description: ISO language code with or without variation (e.g., 'de', 'en-UK', ...)

after.description: The probabilities to cut AFTER patterns. Defaults to an empty list.

items.description: Regex pattern matching a sequence in the text.

probability.description: The probability of cutting the text after the patterns.

override.description: If true, this probability will be enforced, even if a higher probability is found. Defaults to false.

before.description: The probabilities to cut BEFORE patterns. Defaults to an empty list.

items.description: Regex pattern matching a sequence in the text.

probability.description: The probability of cutting the text before the patterns.

default.description: Default probability to cut anywhere else not listed in after's and before's sequences. Defaults to 1.
